comments: Lots of energy and approachable. The class was hard, but if you do the work, it\'s manageable.

She\'s great at french and I can understand her, which is definitely good, but she plays favorites like no other. If you aren\'t one of her favorites, it\'s extremely likely that she won\'t help you. She is a very nice person though, and for the most part a good teacher. Just a very difficult class.

Very hard if you aren\'t her best friend. If you ask for tutoring and she doesn\'t favor you, she will recommend you to other tutors who are never there, when you should be learning from her and her teaching style, so you understand what\'s going on in class. DO NOT take this class. Quizzes every week that everyone fails & pointless workbook homework.
Horrible teacher. Boring, and definitely chooses her favorites. If you are not one of them, you are about to have one hell of a time.
Amazing Prof. Very clear, easy if you understand how her classes work! Great FR prof. Great WT
